keyToStrMap.0: His name is Finn and he is a farmer.
keyToStrMap.1: People in the world of the living leave flowers for the dead. Every time someone leaves flowers, a word plant grows in Finn’s field.
keyToStrMap.2: It was Finn’s grandfather who discovered that you can extract word energy from the flowers of the word plants. Word energy is their version of electricity and petrol - it’s really important.
keyToStrMap.3: Each kind of flower needs a different kind of machine to extract its energy.
keyToStrMap.4: Finn has lots of different machines, but he often gets confused about which flowers to put in which machine.
keyToStrMap.5: He has heard that I’m the best one in town at this sort of thing.

keyToStrMap.Full:
Finn the Farmer

Occupation:
[] Farmer

Likes:
[] Sunbathing, eating rice

Dislikes:
[] Cleaning, going to the bank

Favourite quote:
[] If you smile when no one else is around, you really mean it.

Favourite people in the (living) world:
[] My wife

How I came to be here:
[] Swallowed too much bubblegum.

What I wish:
[] That I hadn’t swallowed all of that bubblegum.
